alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 10:57PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Albany, central Greene and southeastern Schoharie Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1057 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prattsville, or 15 miles northwest of Hunter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause poor drainage flooding. Locations impacted include... Hunter, Windham, Gilboa, Prattsville, Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, North-South Lake Campground, Cairo, Durham, Ashland, Jewett, Lexington, Conesville, Tannersville, West Settlement, North Lexington, Maplecrest, Round Top, Result and Kiskatom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene
